list.description: Шntegrated localization platform with designer tools like Figma, AdobeXD.
Work on platform to connect more than 10k nurses with clients in Uber style.
Set-up and automated localization process for Node.js. Contributing to a new version of website.
Implemented 10 modules for ScreenCloud player ecosystem. Each of them is separate integration with specific API, like Google Calendar, Google Slides, Facebook, Youtube, Zoho, Yammer and other.
Implemented fitness social network in medium agile team.
Email marketing, online advertising, customer support, and website development.

list.q: What type of cooperation would I prefer?

list.a: I have a plan to move to Canada, with my wife, until I'm 25 years old. On the other hand, I'm ready to work remotely with any company around the world, but Canadians have a +20 bonus to my choice.

list.q: What industry would I like to work in?
list.a: Innovations, Healthcare, Music / Sound Engineering or something interesting
I'm ready to work with both, but... if I have a choice it's a frontend
I remember a lot of discussions about this, but for the last 2 years, I prefer to React, in the reason of requirements for projects.
